Pre-release today.
  
   
Oppenent plays this.
  
Opponent deals me 8 damage.
  
I pull [Switcheroo](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Switcheroo)!
  
   
"Here, have one of my Drake tokens, I'll take your Leviathan."
  
   
Opponent: :( --> x\_x
  
   
(Admittedly, he won the first and third games, though.)

A powerhouse. My favourite finisher in my [Heartless Summoning](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Heartless Summoning) deck if the machinegun combo decides not to play ball.
